text:
[Verse]
Sunrise chases night
City wakes in sight
Dreamers rise and shine
Catch the light it's mine

[Verse 2]
Footsteps hit the street
Rhythm in the beat
Echoes louder now
Feel the city's vow

[Chorus]
Catch the light oh
Chase the bright glow
Don't let it go no
Catch the light oh

[Verse 3]
Laughter fills the air
Moments we all share
Breathing in the day
In this wild ballet

[Chorus]
Catch the light oh
Chase the bright glow
Don't let it go no
Catch the light oh

[Bridge]
Heartbeat syncs with stars
Travel near and far
Morning til the night
We will catch the light
title: Catch the Light
